sentence.Network_en: His last book, "Needful Things", was a retread of tired material.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的上一本书《必需品》尽在重复些老掉牙的内容。

sentence.Network_en: The section of society most needful of such guidance is the young male.

sentence.Network_cn: 为了生活, 我必需要你所谓的 “ 钱 ”, 而我只有工作才能挣钱.
